For those people who don't bother reading previous posts...

Game is... 
WORKING
PRE CRACKED
NO LAN SUPPORT (As of Now)
NO STEAM INVOLVED

Just Mount/Install and Play...

If you cant play it Co-Op...  dont bother.. Seriously.  The game is 100% based around having TWO people on the maps.. its over-retardly difficult with 1 person.  So much so that any sense of "fun" is sucked straight out as you try to defend 2 rifts, 6 doors, on maps that take as much as 30 seconds to get from 1 side to the other.

You can play co-op on this game with even the pirated version, if you spend just a little time researching, you'll find out how to do it easy enough, there is a detailed guide on skidrows website even.
